verses.verse: לְדָוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid, [A Psalm] of David מַ֫שְׂכִּ֥יל <S%H4905><s%> mas-Kil Maschil אַשְׁרֵ֥י <S%H835><s%> 'ash-Rei Blessed נְֽשׂוּי־ <S%H5375><s%> ne-sui- [is] forgiven פֶּ֗שַׁע <S%H6588><s%> Pe-sha', [is he whose] transgression כְּס֣וּי <S%H3680><s%> ke-Sui [is] covered חֲטָאָֽה׃ <S%H2401><s%> cha-ta-'Ah. [whose] sin

אַ֥שְֽׁרֵי <S%H835><s%> 'Ash-rei Blessed אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, [is] the man לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo does not יַחְשֹׁ֬ב <S%H2803><s%> yach-Sho imputeth יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto whom the LORD ל֣וֹ lo עָוֹ֑ן <S%H5771><s%> 'a-Von; not iniquity וְאֵ֖ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein there בְּרוּח֣וֹ <S%H7307><s%> be-ru-Cho and in whose spirit רְמִיָּה׃ <S%H7423><s%> re-mi-yah [there is] no guile

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- When הֶ֭חֱרַשְׁתִּי <S%H2790><s%> He-che-rash-ti When I kept silence בָּל֣וּ <S%H1086><s%> ba-Lu waxed old עֲצָמָ֑י <S%H6106><s%> 'a-tza-Mai; my bones בְּ֝שַׁאֲגָתִ֗י <S%H7581><s%> be-sha-'a-ga-Ti, through my roaring כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom. all the day

כִּ֤י׀ <S%H3588><s%> ki For יוֹמָ֣ם <S%H3119><s%> yo-Mam For day וָלַיְלָה֮ <S%H3915><s%> va-lay-Lah and night תִּכְבַּ֥ד <S%H3513><s%> tich-Bad was heavy עָלַ֗י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai, and יָ֫דֶ֥ךָ <S%H3027><s%> ya-De-cha thy hand נֶהְפַּ֥ךְ <S%H2015><s%> neh-Pach is turned לְשַׁדִּ֑י <S%H3955><s%> le-shad-Di; upon me my moisture בְּחַרְבֹ֖נֵי <S%H2725><s%> be-char-Vo-nei into the drought קַ֣יִץ <S%H7019><s%> Ka-yitz of summer סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

חַטָּאתִ֨י <S%H2403><s%> chat-ta-Ti my sin אוֹדִ֪יעֲךָ֡ <S%H3045><s%> o-Di-'a-cha I acknowledged וַעֲוֹ֘נִ֤י <S%H5771><s%> va-'a-Vo-Ni unto thee and mine iniquity לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not כִסִּ֗יתִי <S%H3680><s%> chis-Si-ti, have I not hid אָמַ֗רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar-ti, I said אוֹדֶ֤ה <S%H3034><s%> o-Deh I will confess עֲלֵ֣י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei and פְ֭שָׁעַי <S%H6588><s%> Fe-sha-'ai my transgressions לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; unto the LORD וְאַתָּ֨ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah and You נָ֘שָׂ֤אתָ <S%H5375><s%> na-Sa-ta and thou forgavest עֲוֹ֖ן <S%H5771><s%> 'a-Von the iniquity חַטָּאתִ֣י <S%H2403><s%> chat-ta-Ti of my sin סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and זֹ֡את <S%H2063><s%> zot likewise יִתְפַּלֵּ֬ל <S%H6419><s%> yit-pal-Lel pray כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- everyone חָסִ֨יד׀ <S%H2623><s%> cha-Sid For this shall every one that is godly אֵלֶיךָ֮ <S%H413><s%> 'e-lei-Cha to you לְעֵ֪ת <S%H6256><s%> le-'Et unto thee in a time מְ֫צֹ֥א <S%H4672><s%> me-Tzo when thou mayest be found רַ֗ק <S%H7535><s%> Rak, in לְ֭שֵׁטֶף <S%H7858><s%> Le-she-tef surely in the floods מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim waters רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim; of great אֵ֝לָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, about לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo they will not יַגִּֽיעוּ׃ <S%H5060><s%> yag-Gi-'u. they shall not come nigh

אַתָּ֤ה׀ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You סֵ֥תֶר <S%H5643><s%> Se-ter Thou [art] my hiding place לִי֮ li מִצַּ֪ר <S%H6862><s%> mitz-Tzar me from trouble תִּ֫צְּרֵ֥נִי <S%H5341><s%> titz-tze-Re-ni thou shalt preserve רָנֵּ֥י <S%H7438><s%> ran-Nei me about with songs פַלֵּ֑ט <S%H6405><s%> fal-Let; of deliverance תְּס֖וֹבְבֵ֣נִי <S%H5437><s%> te-Sov-Ve-ni thou shalt compass סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

אַשְׂכִּֽילְךָ֨׀ <S%H7919><s%> 'as-ki-le-Cha I will instruct וְֽאוֹרְךָ֗ <S%H3384><s%> ve-'or-Cha, thee and teach בְּדֶֽרֶךְ־ <S%H1870><s%> be-de-rech- thee in the way ז֥וּ <S%H2098><s%> zu which תֵלֵ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> te-Lech; go אִֽיעֲצָ֖ה <S%H3289><s%> 'i-'a-Tzah I will guide עָלֶ֣יךָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-cha with עֵינִֽי׃ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Ni. thee with mine eye

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nay תִּֽהְי֤וּ׀ <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yu become כְּס֥וּס <S%H5483><s%> ke-Sus Be ye not as the horse כְּפֶרֶד֮ <S%H6505><s%> ke-fe-Red [or] as the mule אֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein have הָ֫בִ֥ין <S%H995><s%> ha-Vin [which] have no understanding בְּמֶֽתֶג־ <S%H4964><s%> be-me-teg- in with bit וָרֶ֣סֶן <S%H7448><s%> va-Re-sen and bridle עֶדְי֣וֹ <S%H5716><s%> ed-Yo whose mouth לִבְל֑וֹם <S%H1102><s%> liv-Lom; must be held בַּ֝֗ל <S%H1077><s%> Bal, lest קְרֹ֣ב <S%H7126><s%> ke-Ro they come near אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha. about

רַבִּ֥ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim Many מַכְאוֹבִ֗ים <S%H4341><s%> mach-'o-Vim, sorrows לָרָ֫שָׁ֥ע <S%H7563><s%> la-Ra-Sha' [shall be] to the wicked וְהַבּוֹטֵ֥חַ <S%H982><s%> ve-hab-bo-Te-ach but he that trusteth בַּיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; in the LORD חֶ֝֗סֶד <S%H2617><s%> Che-sed, mercy יְסוֹבְבֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H5437><s%> ye-sov-Ven-nu. shall compass

שִׂמְח֬וּ <S%H8055><s%> sim-Chu Be glad בַֽיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh in the LORD וְ֭גִילוּ <S%H1523><s%> Ve-gi-lu and rejoice צַדִּיקִ֑ים <S%H6662><s%> tzad-di-Kim; ye righteous וְ֝הַרְנִ֗ינוּ <S%H7442><s%> ve-har-Ni-nu, and shout כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יִשְׁרֵי־ <S%H3477><s%> yish-rei- for joy all [ye that are] upright לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> Lev. in heart
